service.ALREADY_EXISTS: A coupon with the same code already exists
service.DATABASE_CONNECTION_FAILED: unable to connect to the database

dto.CODE_IS_STRING: Coupon code must be a string.
dto.CODE_MIN_LENGTH: Coupon code must be at least 3 characters long.
dto.CODE_MAX_LENGTH: Coupon code must be at most 50 characters long.
dto.EXPIRATION_DATE_IS_DATE: Expiration date must be a valid date.
dto.EXPIRATION_DATE_IS_IN_FUTURE: Expiration date must be in the future.
dto.ACTIVE_IS_BOOLEAN: Active status must be a boolean.
dto.MIN_ORDER_TOTAL_IS_NUMBER: Minimum order total must be a number.
dto.MAX_DISCOUNT_IS_NUMBER: Maximum discount amount must be a number.
